function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient disinfection of indoor air and surfaces","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission of contagious diseases within the medical facility","Mitigation":"Increase frequency and thoroughness of disinfection protocols, use advanced disinfection technologies","Technologies":"Plasma-based air disinfector, chlorine-containing disinfectant, sodium hypochlorite","People":"Patients, medical staff, visitors","Owner":"Medical facility management, cleaning staff, infection control team"},{"Description":"Inadequate sampling and testing of patient and staff samples","Impact":"Failure to detect and isolate infected individuals, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement more frequent and comprehensive sampling and testing protocols, utilize advanced testing methods","Technologies":"Real time polymerase chain reaction (PCR), RT-PCR","People":"Patients, medical staff, visitors","Owner":"Medical laboratory, testing staff, infection control team"},{"Description":"Incomplete environmental sampling and PPE site sampling","Impact":"Risk of missing contaminated areas and failing to properly identify sources of infection in the hospital environment","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough and systematic sampling of environmental surfaces and PPE sites, employ advanced sampling methods","Technologies":"ClassiqSwabs, universal transport medium (UTM), sampling technology","People":"Patients, medical staff, visitors","Owner":"Infection control team, environmental services department"}]}
